《HKEx》- 01006 CHANGSHOUHUA - JOINT ANNOUNCEMENT
(1) PROPOSAL FOR THE PRIVATISATION OF CHANGSHOUHUA FOOD
COMPANY LIMITED BY SANXING TRADE CO., LTD. BY WAY OF A
SCHEME OF ARRANGEMENT
(UNDER SECTION 86 OF THE COMPANIES LAW)
(2) PROPOSED WITHDRAWAL OF LISTING OF CHANGSHOUHUA FOOD
COMPANY LIMITED
(3) EFFECTIVE DATE OF THE SCHEME
(4) WITHDRAWAL OF LISTING
AND
(5) DESPATCH OF CHEQUES UNDER THE SCHEME
